infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: HomListi uses the camera to capture and upload user profile image and Listing Image to the server.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: HomListi needs access to the photo library to select and upload user profile image and Listing Image to the server.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: HomListi needs access to the photo library to select and upload user profile image and Listing Image to the server.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: HomListi usages device location on listing information, Listing search Data and User information.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: HomListi usages device location on listing information, Listing search Data and User information.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: HomListi uses device location on listing information, Listing search Data and User information.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: HomListi uses your microphone while taking video of your property for uploading in listing information.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: HomListi wants to track you to collect IDFA to deliver personalised ads.
